Package game.mc

Class MCGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.mc.MCGame
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Game<MCPlayer,MCAction>, Drawable
    public final class MCGame
extends java.lang.Object
implements Game<MCPlayer,MCAction>, Drawable
    Implements the two-player Martian Chess
    See Also:
    Martian Chess

      • score

        public static int score​(int[][] board,
                        int[][] figures,
                        MCAction prevAction,
                        int prevScore,
                        int color,
                        MCAction action)
        Returns the score of the specified action corresponds to the specified state or -1 for an invalid action.
        Parameters:
        board - current board
        figures - the number of available figures of the players, the array is indexed by:
        first, the color of a player;
        second, the value of a figure -1.
        prevAction - previous action
        prevScore - score of the previous action
        color - color of the current player
        action - action of the current player
        Returns:
        score of the action.
